title: Oil review. No. 10
creator_credit: Humphrey Swingler, Anglo Iranian Oil Company and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Magazine film in three sections: “War on winter” - showing modern methods of land clearance in northern Sweden; “Work on wax” - showing how another oil product is finding a multitude of everyday uses; “London’s times” - how oil helps to keep the phenomenal accuracy of the famous Big Ben.
